Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: C. Paul
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our daughters room. I was a little weary with it being a name that I have never heard but the screen/image quality is EXCELLENT. I was fully prepared to return this tv, but I must say that I am very impressed..An other review states that the image color changes at an angle. This is true... However, it is not an issue for us at all. I only notice it when standing directly beside the tv and who watches a tv from that angle?

Reviews.Title: Great affordable TV for Kids, Kitchen, Bath, RV (Extended Review)
Reviews.Author: Liar! Return was denied after claim filed
Reviews.Content: Pros: Aesthetics, Picture, Input options, Price, Low power consumptionCons: Poor single speaker, cheap remote control. Marginal base.Conclusion: We would buy this product again, we would recommend this product to a friend or family member at the right price.Appearance/Application: Looks great in our kitchen (see uploaded images), you really could not ask for more on how it looks, for a cheap TV its fantastic.  Paired this with a older Roku from the bedroom and we were up and running wireless in no time. All our home media streams to it along with Netflix etc. so we dont have to have a cable box or DVR in the kitchen. Compact package. Added a 5 year squaretrade warranty for this TV.  $62 + taxes is a solid deal.Picture: 720p, Good contrast. Vibrant color. Good brightness. Light bleed from top and bottom evenly, appears to be edge lit screen. Other reviews bashing the viewing angle are being critical for this price point, we can see the screen fine from a wide angle. Picture was better than expected. Quick cycle of the picture options on the dedicated remote button yields improved picture over power saving default.Sound: The speaker does face out the bottom and its not a good experience. Cycling sound preset options on dedicated remote button yields instant improvements. Its better sound than my Toshiba 24" LED.  Sound was about what I expected out of a cheap 20" TV.  The headphone jack volume is controlled with the remote control (for those that want to add external speakers yet retain volume control via remote) We are adding some $30 Logitech Z200 Multimedia Speakers 2.0 speakers to this TV. (4.5 Stars)Connectivity: 1 HDMI / 1 Composite / VGA with 3.5mm computer audio in / RCA Audio in / Coaxial Audio in / Headphone Jack out(See uploaded images to see all input/output panels clearly)Remote: Looks and feels fairly cheap. Battery door jiggles a bit. Its more than adequate and is full featured. (See uploaded image)Packaging: Very well packaged and shipped, small box. Easy to give for a gift and wrap it. Assembly includes 4 screws in bottom of base to neck, and 3 screws from neck to TV main unit. Phillips screwdriver is all that is required.Base:  is lacking some stability. Its just enough to get the job done but I do wish it was a bit more solid. For use in a kitchen for my application it will do fine. Anyone not using the base will find this to be a non issue. Its not flimsy, it just has some movement if you grab the bezel and try to move the TV, it shifts around a little bit.*Update regarding base problems* Manufacturers packaging error in screws led to poor loose fit of base and tilting.I received 3 small screws and 4 larger screws in error. We deemed the original TV too wobbly and returned it for exchange. Calling manufacturer help line on instructions and yielded no useful support. The replacement is better, containing 4 small screws and 3 longer ones in reverse of our first shipment. The base is much more solid than before, yet still leaves a bit to be desired.

Reviews.Title: Not finding digital channels! Very Frustrated
Reviews.Author: Tracyinks
Reviews.Content: As I type this review I have been looking at online forums for help.  I've had other tv's that you simply plugged an antenna into, scanned for channels and boom you had "Antenna TV" .  Not so with this set.  As far as I can tell, on some sets you need an access code from Seiki to "Unlock" the digital signal within the QAM.  The tech line is closed so they prompt you to send an email to their gmail account and wait for the code to be sent to you.  Right now, I am thinking my GREAT deal from Amazon is not so great!

Reviews.Title: A great little TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: First off, with some of the reviews you'd think people had been ripped off on a lease for the Taj Mahal.C'mon, it's a cheap 20" LCD TV. You didn't just go buy a 50" 4k TV from Sony. Though I was surprised to find that the casing for the LCD unit is metal (the TV components parts are cased in plastic)It has one HDMI input (which I think is one too few), coax RGB and VGA inputs.It's a perfect complement to a Chromecast or Roku for your bedroom or office.You do need to screw the base together and then screw the base to the LCD, it doesn't clip in.

Reviews.Title: Picture good, sound not so much.
Reviews.Author: Chuck Conrad
Reviews.Content: Picture is good but the sound is awful. I'll probably get some external speakers to compensate. But for the price you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Shocked and Amazed
Reviews.Author: Omar V Greene III
Reviews.Content: I purchased this little TV for my bedroom. I wanted to be in bed when I fall asleep watching a DVD or a program. After I connected the cable and set the TV up, I was blown away. I've been in electronics and video for decades and I couldn't believe the clarity and crispness of the display for such a small area! I fine tuned it to my desires and I couldn't be more pleased. It has all the inputs and outputs that units have that cost 4 times as much. For the price, this TV cannot be beat. I HIGHLY recommend this unit to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Buy this tv with speakers because the sound is horrible, but i like it how you can input headphone into the tv. Good screen quality.

Reviews.Title: kids love it
Reviews.Author: Leeann hunsinger
Reviews.Content: i got this for my kids room and it has an amazing picture and sounds great im very happy with my purchase and u cant beat the price either!

Reviews.Title: the picture is great
Reviews.Author: S. Nelson "video mom"
Reviews.Content: this tv is well worth the small amout paid for it.  i have a larger seiki in my den.  the thing thats notciable is the sound.  my other seiki has surround sound and that fixed the problem but in this one i turned the surround off and put it in the music position and that ended the problem on this tv.  it has a great picture and color and a smart looking tv.  you couldnt ask for more in this price point.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Poor Sound, Flimsy Stand
Reviews.Author: Robert Barnes
Reviews.Content: Picture is good, but the sound is terrible ("tinny"). Also, the stand is cheap and comes in two pieces which you must screw together and the screws strip the threads very easily, leaving the stand leaning. Don't waste your money on this one.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: J. murphy
Reviews.Content: Just got this delivered, easy setup with my little antenna,just attached the base and turned it on. Works perfectly- just the right size for our bedroom- sound is a little tinny as noted, but I adjusted it with a bit more bass,not  a huge issue as far as we're concerned. picture is beautiful.... Excellent value for the price- for 66.00, I was expecting much less,happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Eaton "parttime gamer"
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture for the price. Works great for our bedroom tv. Sound might be a little weak for a bigger room.

Reviews.Title: I have NEVER experienced WORSE customer service in my life
Reviews.Author: Paul DeLucia
Reviews.Content: Ordered a Seiki product and after 9 months, the audio/visual ports stopped working. We contacted the company and after talking to a tech support rep, we instructed to ship it back to them (at our own expense) and they would ship us a new one because our malfunctioning unit was still under their "great" 1 year warranty.We shipped it to their location in Mississippi (at a personal cost of $120) We were initially instructed to email the tracking number to the rep we had originally spoken with to speed up the process of them shipping us the new one. We shipped out the originally TV on Nov. 20th.  We never received any confirmation that they had received the number or later the product until we called 2 weeks later. After being on hold for 30+min on several occasions (most times we were sent to voice-mail) we were told everything was in line to ship and to expect our new TV within 7-14 business days. After two more weeks, we called back. still no TV. we were told that they no longer made our model and we would have to wait until a refurbished model was available. Already having waited a month for this replacement, we refused to accept this and finally got a supervisor to approve an upgrade to the next size up. We have since been waiting for the replacement, approaching two months now. Every time we have called, we are told its waiting to be shipped or they are backed up and it will take up to 5 weeks to ship or their warehouse is out of stock. Every time a new story. We are out several hundred dollars between the initial purchase of this TV along with shipping it back. I would NEVER recommend anyone purchase anything from Seiki, they are incompetence and disregard for their customers incarnate.

Reviews.Title: Image quality is quite good, audio takes  a moment to get use to.
Reviews.Author: Bobbydigital
Reviews.Content: Not a bad TV especially for $75.  Image quality is really good but Im sure if someone with calibration skills could make this excellent in terms of picture and "good" in terms of sound.  I will tinker with it over the next few days and give an update if I find good settings.Audio takes a moment to get used to but it is loud and does the job.  Volume "10" totally fills my apartment to give you an idea.This TV should last me to winter of 2014, that's when I plan to buy a 4k.  So this $75 tv will be my main TV.The funny thing is that I have a Playstation 4 hooked up to it :)UPDATE (12/30/2013):I am going to return this TV.  Not because its bad.  Its simply too small to play games on, lol.I did tweak the settings around and noticed a major thing to make sound better.  Go to the menu, then to "audio," scroll down to "surround sound" and turn it to "on".  Max out your "bass" to "100" as and wow! a really good difference compared to the original factory setup.Also, here are decent picture settings I liked:Contrast: 25Brightness: 50Color: 30Sharpness: 15Color Temp: WarmHope I helped.  I actually changed my review from 4 stars to 5.  For about $75 bucks, this TV is amazing if it fits your specific use.  I thought the TV would do for a year... but its just to small.  I might consider upgrading the size with this brand if the price point is on scale to this.

Reviews.Title: Its okay for $75 bucks
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A good looking easy to operate television....however the speaker being positioned on the bottom makes it sound ridiculously odd! It was purchased for a child who loves it so....all is well.

Reviews.Title: The price was good and it does what I need it to do.
Reviews.Author: Randy Hinger
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my daughter's room with a Chromecast so that she could watch Netflix in her room. The picture is fair but the sound is a little bit tinny. Although, for what it cost, I am more than satisfied with what I got.

Reviews.Title: NOT DIGITAL READY!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Was very excited to get the tv for a good price, but it would not pick up my digital channels. Talked to the company and all they told me was that it must be my cable company's problem and this was not true. Was told after my cable company did some research on the tv (unlike the tv company) that you had to put in some code to get it to work but would void the return guarantee. So I just returned it.

Reviews.Title: not pleased with the sound quality
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: I do not watch this TV.  My wife LISTENS to this TV while she is using a treadmill every day for exercise.  She LISTENS to channel 6069 on Dish Network for easy listening music.  She says that the sound quality is on the "tinny" side, not nearly as good as the 15 year old 19" Motorola TV that we had in that room  previously.

Reviews.Title: Not able to receive digital channels without cable box.
Reviews.Author: Richard V Medd
Reviews.Content: The description states that this tv has "digital/analog auto tuning."  But after talking to Seiki customer service today, I was told it does not.  This tuner in this tv will only program analog channels. Disappointed, even for $100.  Going back.

Reviews.Title: these are great
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: Although there ARE examples of cheaper production quality with these sets, all-in-all these aren't inexpensive because they are low quality. They're inexpensive because they from a company headquartered in China where things are relatively more inexpensive altogether, and are manufactured in California to avoid pricey shipping costs and import taxes.The screen is very nice and MUCH better quality than any other cheaper set, in fact it's just as good if not better than any mid-range product out there. They use the same electronics as Vizio (you should even be able to use your Vizio remote to control it if you like).The remote that comes with it works great, feels good, but looks cheap. Tiny trimmings like a plastic overlay on the back panels where you connect your input wires is missing leaving uncovered metal, but it makes no difference at all unless you have your set in the middle of the room rather than up against a wall because otherwise you'll never be looking at the back of your TV. The stands are hit and miss - mine is fine but some people have written reviews saying theirs was wobbly.One weird quirk this TV has is that in order to adjust the color, tint, and sharpness you have to press MENU, then 0000 (hit the Zero button four times). The regular menu doesn't let you change much - just brightness and contrast on a "User" picture mode or switch between factory presets like "movie", "sports", and the like. Hitting 0000 in the menu lets you play with the factory settings where you can adjust the other options.

Reviews.Title: Surprised with how good this TV is for the price
Reviews.Author: Barry Brown
Reviews.Content: I asked for this little Seiki 20" TV for a Christmas present after reading some so-so reviews here and wondering if I should get it... but I went ahead since it was very inexpensive. I opened it up at Christmas, and it's packaged well - a very compact box that includes the remote and batteries with a manual and quick start guide.I wanted this TV for a room where I have a computer and some ham radio equipment, so I wanted this TV to double as a monitor for that computer. After attaching the base (4 screws that are included to attach the vertical part to the base, then 3 screws to attach the entire base to the TV), I plugged it in and plugged an antenna into it (antenna is not included). For an inside antenna, I picked up a lot of channels, so the TV tuner is really pretty good at picking up signals that have decent strength.For some reason I can't adjust the tint - the tint slider is greyed out - but right out of the box the picture looks pretty decent and doesn't need tint adjustment. I did have to back off the color a few notches, but I'm pleased with the picture on this Seiki!Next I got a computer monitor cable (also not included) and connected the VGA connection to my computer. After updating my video card driver (an old XP Nvidia graphics card) so I could run the widescreen 1366 x 768 resolution, it came right up and looks very nice. It's definitely no worse than the 20" LCD LG monitor that this TV/monitor replaced.I can highly recommend this TV since it's so cheap. If it was way over $100, no, but if you need an inexpensive TV or monitor, I think it's just fine!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Joshua Drucker
Reviews.Content: TV is outstanding.  I am not sure what other poster's issues are with the sound, because it sounds good enough to me.  I bought 2 of these a few weeks ago.  1 for the kitchen and 1 for my mother-in-law's bedroom.  She loves it!.  Its a great buy at <80 price.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Lavenant
Reviews.Content: Good image and quality for the price. Good guarantee. Brilliant colors. Poor sound but with the surround sound is ok.

Reviews.Title: Meets needs
Reviews.Author: johnb
Reviews.Content: As usual, you get what you pay for. For less than 75, this was a great value. If your thinking about it, get it!

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Leigh
Reviews.Content: The screen tilts to one side. It has a clear picture. It was a good deal at $66 for a 20". Can't complain.

Reviews.Title: We Have 3 Seikis
Reviews.Author: sightsandsounds
Reviews.Content: Its 2 years now, We have a 40 ", a 26", and a 20" Seiki. 2 years ago they were all the rage all the web stores were selling them, some of them got a bad rap because there was a problem with upgrades, and some of the refurbs didnt turn out good. We wanted to go all LCD TVs and went with Seiki, I am a gambler. We got all 3 within 3 months, and they are ALL doing great to this day. I have the 26 " as my PC monitor, and its fantastic even when I play netflix on it. I am very happy with Seiki and I would say Go for These, you will Love Them.

Reviews.Title: Nice LED TV
Reviews.Author: Jack Daniels
Reviews.Content: Was pleasantly surprised with this TV especially since it has an HDMI port which is usually found on more expensive units.Have it hooked up to a laptop for a larger screen presently and the kid loves it. Of course, it was for his Mom but he commandeered it upon arrival and of course she wants him to have it like most tech gifts I get her. Ah.....kids of today...lol.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Chris Graves
Reviews.Content: I received this tv for christmas and I love it.  I will admit that the sound is a little quiet but thats just fine, i use this for video games and its great. It is also light and portable, so i can move it around as much with no trouble.

Reviews.Title: Overall a Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Stephen Darr
Reviews.Content: I lucked into a Lightening Deal for $69.00.  I use this TV for my office/computer room.  It has a thorough menu to make adjustments to picture, sound...etc.  The picture is good, but the sound is a bit tinny.  You do have the option of using the front speaker, or the back speaker-surround sound.  The surround option sounds a bit better.  I would not want this for my main TV due to the sound quality, however, since this will be a TV that is used only when I would like watch while I'm working on the computer, it suits my purposes very well.  I haven't tried hooking up an external sound system, but that might make it better.  For the price, it can't be beat.  Overall, I'm happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Fine TV for what it is.
Reviews.Author: The Connors
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  If you are expecting a great tv with a wonderful viewing angle then this isn't the tv for you.  What it is, is a nice enough tv with ok speakers.  I recommend being directly in front of it or just a few degrees off and this should be fine.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: carl easley
Reviews.Content: bought this for my parents to put in their camper, for the kids, picture is good no issues, was super cheap works great

Reviews.Title: Great compact monitor
Reviews.Author: Thomas Christian
Reviews.Content: Purchased this monitor for a small space. For the price it is a great product. Even the small speakers sound good. Hocked the unit up to some computer speakers with subwoofer and the sound is even better.

Reviews.Title: It's a nice TV
Reviews.Author: Lemuel
Reviews.Content: I bought this back in December for $67 and it was a great deal. I have it set up in the bedroom, no problem setting up the rabbit ears, only thing "bad" about it is the sound. I would buy again!

Reviews.Title: $90.32 on May 8,2014 from Amazon Warehouse Deals - LIKE NEW
Reviews.Author: devoted reader "gemini2005"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace my failing TV and to use with Amazon Fire TV.Terrific TV for me.  I don't find the sound quality a problem - some other reviewers have said they thought it tinny.An HD TV for under $100 suits me!Even though Amazon Warehouse Deals said there were small scratches on the item, there were *no* scratches or any indication that this had ever been handled after leaving the manufacturer.Easy assembly of the stand with everything (including batteries for the remote) you need in the box except a Phillips-head screwdriver, which you probably have.

Reviews.Title: Husband loves this TV
Reviews.Author: Darlene Richardson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband on Christmas and he just loves it.  My only complaint is the sound is a bit tinny - no bass to mellow it out, but he loves it!!!

Reviews.Title: screen size is perfect. picture is sharp and clear
Reviews.Author: mialbertichael
Reviews.Content: great picture , siize just right for my needs . perfect size for my work station. really fits my needs

Reviews.Title: Such a deal!
Reviews.Author: JD Larrick
Reviews.Content: OK, I admit I did not expect much for this price. This was going to be mounted near a treadmill in the garage, and I wasn't going to dump $400 into a TV for that. So, I gave this a try. Boy what a surprise! Decent picture quality and so far, it's held up. The sound is fair (actually a little better than expected) and the viewing angle is somewhat narrow, but it exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: It popped up as one of the Amazon Unbelievable Deals ... figured how bad for $79 could it be
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: SURPRISINGLY A VERY VERY NICE ....... SMALL 20" hdtv.What I like most is how really slim the screen really is.  All my other (larger) flat screens (low end priced) are not so ''thin" with their thick black case on side and back.  This is 'fancy' looking and great for kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Good picture -- weak speakers
Reviews.Author: Grahamsterdam
Reviews.Content: This is a great unit for video, however you'll want to hook up external speakers.  I had some extra computer speakers with a subwoofer I use since the built-in speakers are "tinny".  It only has one HDMI input so if you have multiple HDMI devices you'll need a splitter (Amazon has cheap ones that work fine see: http://www.amazon.com/Port-HDMI-Pigtail-Switch-Cable/dp/B0030AZ44O/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid;=1396988970&sr;=8-3&keywords;=hdmi+splitter)For $65 you really can't go wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great for my office
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Thayer "geminidreamz"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my basement office. My daughter watches cartoons on it while I work when I have her at home with me on work days. The picture is great and the sound is decent (much better than the sound on my same sized Westinghouse TV in my bedroom).

Reviews.Title: Very very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Sapr
Reviews.Content: I brought this in a deal from amazon and my plan was to use it as my computer monitor. But occasionally, i add my chromecast to it to watch netflix, youtube. Its been few months already and is working perfectly fine. The sound quality was better than i had expected.Setup: very easy !! unpack, connect my computer HDMI to TV, power it on, select sourcePros: good picture and sound quality, easy setup, HDMI, inexpensiveCon: not a major one but i am not able to tilt monitor upwards

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Buk Wyrm
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and good picture. Great for a small room.Sound isn't as strong as I would like it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Holly Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for playing games on my xbox and so far am very impressed with the clarity. I can actually read the screen, it's so much better than the old clunky box tv, I had before it. Shipping was fast and it was easy to assemble.

Reviews.Title: Great deal I ever made and more space
Reviews.Author: Nickolaus Gonzales "dvd fever"
Reviews.Content: Great price and deal and I used it often and it works very well so far and it is led tv.

Reviews.Title: Delivered quickly,
Reviews.Author: Virginia F.More
Reviews.Content: Liked the price, picture and sound great and just enjoying it with the new mini cable box watch HDMI -

Reviews.Title: you get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: Marisa Solis
Reviews.Content: Its not a bad TV it works great just the stand it came with is not very sturdy or I  guess durable its cheap and kind of weak. But other than that great product

Reviews.Title: Seiki tv great buy
Reviews.Author: Renee Walsh
Reviews.Content: I can't  say enough about this tv the pitcher and sound are as good as any other  brand 3 times the price love it

Reviews.Title: Seiki Digital TV as second monitor
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I have been using this T.V. for a while now(a month-ish) and its great as a second monitor. i needed to get a fan to keep my laptop cool due to the pressure of doing both screens. The remote has good amount of features to it like an hdmi button in addition to the source button. Also the display and sound are clear and the sound can go quite loud. my only real complaint is the base is a tad flimsy, but it gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Best of the Best
Reviews.Author: anne
Reviews.Content: When I first received this TV I hooked it up to an old antenna and could get no channels.  Called the support number and after a brief conversation, told them I would use this as a monitor for my computer.  After thinking about I realized that I needed a new indoor antenna{I have no cable]. I bought a small flat antenna and now am enjoying loads of channels I have never gotten before. I just love the crispness of picture and the sound is good. If only I had known how great this little screen is I would have bought several at the low price I originally paid. Truly the company Seiki makes a great product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect For My Little Getaway
Reviews.Author: Mr Bull
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv so I can play my video game while my wife still can watch tv. It works perfectly fine if u use the hdmi. The red/white/yellow outlets do not work

Reviews.Title: Mostly positive review
Reviews.Author: CUNPDX
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my exercise room, and mounted it on a wall.  It works great for a cheap TV to watch while exercising.  As others have mentioned, the sound quality is quite poor.  I ended up plugging in a spare set of PC speakers, and that solved the problem nicely.  Keep in mind, this is an inexpensive TV so some compromise is usually in order. Overall, I recommend this product as long as you have speakers.  Otherwise you will eventually feel disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Seiki Digital
Reviews.Author: Lizz D "Lady D"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mom for Christmas, since her old one was broken. She loves it! She wasn't sure at first if the size would be enough for her, but now that she has it hooked up, and has been watching TV on it, she raves over it. She says the sound and picture quality are great, and it's just a nice little TV. Great buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: TO EXPENSIVE
Reviews.Author: FuzzyDice
Reviews.Content: I bought one from amazon.com just a few months ago for $90, was going to get another one but now $160, I will look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: pfarn
Reviews.Content: Works great and was cheaper than a monitor the same size. Arrived early and simple setup. Amazing deal. I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: deborah siva
Reviews.Content: This was and excellent price for this. My son loved it. It was a great Christmas present that he did not expect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Donna Hatten
Reviews.Content: TV has great picture, just what I needed for my small RV. Sound is a little low, but can always add computer speakers if you need more sound. I could not have bought a pair of shoes for what I paid for this TV. I love it

Reviews.Title: seiki review
Reviews.Author: BF
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these as christmas gifts for my children, product arrived on time and they enjoy them, also item went on sale after my purchase, I called customer service and they gave me the new sale price. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Audio is perfect. Great little TV.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "clockreading"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before I bought the TV and several people wrote of the volume being to low. I have no problem at all with the volume on the TV I purchased. Even on the lower scale the volume is high enough for me to hear. Love the sleek design. Perfect for my guest bedroom.

Reviews.Title: It just "OK"
Reviews.Author: Erin Rosenkrans
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty good on this little tv, but the sound is absolutely awful. I have not found a way to change any setting that makes a difference. It sounds like you are listening to it in through a funnel about 50 feet away. Its a great occasional tv (bedroom or guest room) but not a ideal daily user.

Reviews.Title: shocked
Reviews.Author: Ira N. Botnick
Reviews.Content: i was shocked that this inexpensive tv's picture was so good.  u are not going to mistake it for a pioneer kuro, but for the price and size it is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald J Davis
Reviews.Content: Everything  you've read in previous reviews are true. The sound is lacking, adjustments must be made to compensate for the tintiness of the sound. I did this (I bought it for the guest room in my parent's house). Unused extra computer speakers should compensate for the  poor sound quality. If you can get one of these at a good price (Prices flucuate, "20,, "22, "24) keep in mind you will need speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: RNC "Rhontel"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for the spare room which my Grandkids use.  Beautiful picture and perfect size for the kids.  I like that it is very light weight and portable.  I bought my daughter a 50" Seiki for Christmas not knowing what we were getting.  I had never heard of the brand and we were surprised on the price and quality of the picture.  So when I saw the 20" after Chritmas on sale I bought one so I could get rid of the old one in the spare room.  Very impressed and would purchase this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Worthwhile
Reviews.Author: Nancy Whitehead
Reviews.Content: The price was exceptional. The quality of the machine and picture were excellent. I would definitely purchase again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Another great deal through amazon
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: This small tv was perfect for my use of it. Use it as combo to view DVD,Mac,and games.it arrived fast and the price was great as usual.

Reviews.Title: Best buy
Reviews.Author: Angie Carrillo
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something for my children, this was a decent price and perfect size. Great for the price!

Reviews.Title: Major disappointment
Reviews.Author: marylou benigno
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be more disappointed.  This TV gives me only one station even with the special antenna.  I will be visiting Radio Shack to see if anything can be done before taking more drastic steps.  It appears that you are forced to sign up with a cable company.  mb

Reviews.Title: Nice TV with the price
Reviews.Author: Huaiwen Wang
Reviews.Content: You can't complain too much with this price. But really, the response is kinda of slow. You have to wait long to see the pic after you press the ON button.

Reviews.Title: TV is great, sound could be better
Reviews.Author: ARC
Reviews.Content: This is my first big flat screenTV and I wasn't sure if I should spring for the extra cost of a smart TV.  I'm glad I did. It was easy to figure out and connect to wi-fi.  I don't have cable but I am a subscriber to Netflix, Amazon Prime and The Blaze TV and have no problem getting them on my TV.  I did have to buy an "n-router" to replace my "g-router" for wi-fi, which increased the signal enough to allow me to get the programs on the smart TV.  I have already watched a couple of seasons of television shows that I never had the chance to see. The picture quality is great.The only down side is the sound.  I've gone into the settings to change the sound and it still isn't as clear as I'd like it to be, so I will probably have to hook up some external speakers at some point.

Reviews.Title: Seiki 20 inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: Glen P.
Reviews.Content: Good value for the price.Color and contrast are off a little even after adjustments are made.Sound is kind of tinny.Makes a good TV for the bedroom and/or den.It is all around a pretty good buy.I have been using it for almost a month and am satsfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy! Top television for price and size
Reviews.Author: Pastor Gary
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV to replace an aging tube style Magnavox on a kitchen counter. I saw this at Amazon and said 'for that price why not give it a try...I can always send it back!"  No, it stays! This little dynamite is packed with all the same goodies my larger LG TV's have and presents a vivid 720p HD picture as good as any. It  assembled in about two minutes had on screen setup which was vary user friendly and allowed for personalization of both picture and sound. The stand is heavy duty enough to limit unwanted movement of the TV itself. Need to rotate it?  just turn the whole thing to where you want it. I also purchased a swivel wall mount for this TV but I really don't think I need it. Overall, you sometimes get what you pay for, this time you can get a whole lot more!

Reviews.Title: A really decent budget TV
Reviews.Author: Benjanim Lockett
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for the price, simple,inexpensive no frills tv. everything you could want exept wifi ,but really at this price who cares??

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Paola Ortega
Reviews.Content: Its a nice tv for the price . The only thing I'm not really a fan of is the sound . But other than that its fine . Also really fast shipping .

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: helen pearson
Reviews.Content: I got a great price on the Seiki Digital 20 inch TV and am very happy with it!  Would recommend it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Good product for price
Reviews.Author: Stacie E. Hall
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these as Christmas presents for my kids.  They work great.  Some reviews I read on here mentioned bad or low sound but we don't have a problem with that.  The only problem we have had is trouble getting their wii's to play on them.  We hooked them up but can't seem to switch the TV over to show the video.  Other than that, they are great little TVs for their bedrooms at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Works well and prize was great ($67)
Reviews.Author: Walter A. Watts
Reviews.Content: The TV was bought for my daughters room where it fits perfectly. The picture is nice. The sound is not up to my 32 and 47inch flatscreens but for the price, I did not expect it too. I'm happy with the purchase and hope that it lasts a long time. Time will see.

Reviews.Title: Flat tv
Reviews.Author: Jeffery A. Clark
Reviews.Content: I really love this tv.  The sound aint the best, but it has a audio output for the stereo system.  Highly recommend getting a MK808 android stick, an external hard drive, and a FM transmitter...hook it all together and you have a stand alone music jukebox for your home.  Really recommend a music player called GoneMad.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the kids.
Reviews.Author: V. Umstattd
Reviews.Content: We purchased 2 of these for our boy's rooms. The main purpose...to play xbox.  Perfect TV for this. No delay problem while playing games. Graphics look great on the screen. Sound is just ok...but we really weren't buying for sound. Does what it needs to do. Would definitely buy again!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: R. Long
Reviews.Content: It has a nice picture and it was simple to set up.  Very light so it is easy for my mother to move.

Reviews.Title: More than what I paid for--
Reviews.Author: Doug Plice
Reviews.Content: Usually you get what you pay for.  $88 is pretty inexpensive and I and very pleased with the picture.  I'd buy another one for another room if i could get it for the same price.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Nice quality TV for the price I paid, it has a good picture and sound quality.  Very good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Cindy's Just Ace
Reviews.Content: For the price, we couldn't go wrong with this TV. We purchased it for our 9 year old daughter's bedroom and it's awesome. The perfect size for her, and the resolution is great!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: cfsdays
Reviews.Content: Caught this little TV on sale for less than $70, figured at that price it was worth a shot.  Has been a good pickup.  Good picture, easy set up.  The only thing needing upgrading has been the sound.  Speakers sound like a transistor radio from the 1960s or '70s.  Dug out some old computer speakers, which gives it good enough sound.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV. Awesome price.
Reviews.Author: scott anderson
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly good TV. Picture looks good. Only negatives are that there are only one of each input and the sound has a chamber-like effect. For the price though, I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: What a bargain............
Reviews.Author: Reginald Stewart
Reviews.Content: I couldn't have purchased a more better TV.  The quality of the picture is excellent for 720 HD.  Definitely worth it's value. The only con is that I wish it had more than one HDMI connection.  So far the only thing I regret is that I didn't purchase more than one.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: K. T. Williams
Reviews.Content: Gift to my Grandma. She had no problems getting it set up and uses it daily. Wonderful clarity nice sound

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: LisaG
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our kitchen. The sound is perfect for that area, I would not recommend for a big room area but as far as a bedroom or kitchen its perfect. The picture is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Bruce Anderson
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture and is a nice compact size for kitchen or bedroom.  I highly reccomend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good lil tv!
Reviews.Author: Mike Smith
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the convenience and portability of this tv. I also use it as a computer display at times. Has a jack for external speakers which you will want.

Reviews.Title: A Great Value
Reviews.Author: Gregory Clemens
Reviews.Content: In a personal TV for the money spent. It was easy to set up the DVD player, add an antenna and bingo!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Greg Gulbrandsen "CascadeCreative Media"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv, dispite some negative reviews of the sound. Well, it works better than expected...considering those reviews. I bought it for the bedroom of my 35 foot fifth wheel RV. There is a cubby for a tv...and originally it had an analog 15 inch in it. Replaced it with this Seiki and now I get great digital reception...and the sound must be enhanced by the cubby space because the sound is a-ok!  Recommended...

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Taraton M. Runner
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my daughters room bc she broke hers. I read alot of the reviews and I admit I was a bit hesitant to purchase but hey it was only $67.00!!! Lol got it in and the picture and sound were great! I can hear it down my hallway so it works for me..

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!!
Reviews.Author: ruth thomley
Reviews.Content: I have PTSD and need the light at night and the sound all the time or I get freaked out with anxiety, so I run the tv pretty much 24/7,so far I have had no problem, the picture is great, the sound isn't too bad at low volume, but is tinny after #7 on the volume. But for the price, It's awesome!! I dont usually write reviews but I think everyone should know about this deal!!

Reviews.Title: Audio
Reviews.Author: The Kid J
Reviews.Content: The 720p graphics are impressive as expected. Although the audio is a little off. It sounds like cheap speakers built it, but i may say its a fairly good price.

Reviews.Title: Good Things DO Come in Small Packages
Reviews.Author: Gary Weiss
Reviews.Content: I'm actually using this LED as a computer monitor. Each of the inputs have a different PC connected. So when I want to work on one PC, I simply change the inputs on the TV. Then if I want to blow some time and watch TV, I just switch to cable.The TV has a basic amount and types of inputs. The remote is laid out nicely. The video quality is just fine and the sound is all I need. ... I wouldn't expect to watch an epic movie on this TV because you would go blind, but for my application, it's great. I was surprised at how light the TV is in the box (it is quite securely packaged, because USP really did a number on the box), I expected the TV to be damaged, but it works GREAT! For $70 ... it's a steal! THANKS

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace the 1980's 20" monster TV in my bedroom!  The picture is great and you can't beat the price!! I read the reviews and main complaint was the sound, which is horrible! I bought some cheap computer speakers as recommended and the problem is solved.  This TV takes a little long to turn on/warm-up, and the on screen text from menu is TINY. Thats all the bad I can come up with. Buy it for bedroom, spare room or your kids, if they are not spoiled rotten and insist on a 47" It is small,  a 20" TV screen is really 17.5" X 10"

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the money!
Reviews.Author: P Saltalamacchio
Reviews.Content: Generally very happy with the unit.  Sound is fine.  Video very good.  Easy setup with cable box, etc., etc., etc.

Reviews.Title: simply marvelous
Reviews.Author: joseph
Reviews.Content: simply marvelous i will sum it up in a simple few words because the want 18 for some ill reason

Reviews.Title: 20 inch tv
Reviews.Author: big gons
Reviews.Content: the tv was a good price i bought it because it was cheap and was brand new sealed in box would recommend

Reviews.Title: decent tv for the price
Reviews.Author: BestPricesForYou
Reviews.Content: Bad sound good image...for the price a good deal. Nice little set ..does the job..I am happy with itMore below[...]

Reviews.Title: Great Small TV
Reviews.Author: robbie kirk
Reviews.Content: Great picture, well pleased . I bought for grand children , which I had bought more! Very good product , great value!

Reviews.Title: Nice T.V.
Reviews.Author: carol prince
Reviews.Content: Good, tv need better sound quality, good for in a kitchen or small area, but overall I thought it was good

Reviews.Title: decent value great pic
Reviews.Author: Andrew W Bogholtz
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  More hdmi connections or component inputs would be better.  Not much bass in sound.  Great for kids room.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Jefferson B.
Reviews.Content: I got this when it was a special for only less than 70 bucks.  At that price, it's great. At over 100? Not so much. However, it can also be used as a computer monitor as most of these TVs can be, so if you want it for that purpose two, like a dorm room, kid's room or kitchen, this is a good buy.It does have a tinny sound so you may want to get a cheap set of computer speakers to upgrade that. The display is okay for what it is. Wasn't expecting a super picture and I'm using it over an analog connection anyway.It's a cheap tv that I didn't have much expectation for and it's serving the purpose. The set up was easy and it's really just a basic set.My main complaint is that Amazon did NOT ship it in a discrete box so when it's delivered, everyone will know you have this new TV in a hard to miss pink box. That being said, if you have this delivered to your house and your neighborhood isn't the best, you may not ever see this TV if you not at home at delivery time.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for price
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo E Garcia O
Reviews.Content: Everything in this LED TV is has the most expensive ones, the speaker manufacturing configuration can be perfected because the bass has to be higher, I just changed this in the settings and the sound and image are perfect.

Reviews.Title: Low cost, works fine
Reviews.Author: Jey Yoony
Reviews.Content: We needed something inexpensive to replace the old CRT in the kitchen.  This fit the bill.  It's light, provides a boost in tech, allowing us to now hook up an HDMI or other input for an HD picture.  I haven't had any problems in the first few weeks of use.  The one star docking is because of the speaker quality - absolutely terrible.  It sounds tinny and cheap  What do you expect I suppose.  We plugged it into some computer speakers and the sound is fine now.  Even for the morning news, we couldn't stand the sound coming out of this TV.

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to get this TV due to the low ratings here. Mostly complaints about the sound. Just remember this is a $70 TV. I didn't expect symphonic sound.The sound is fine for my purposes. The picture is absolutely gorgeous.If you need a cheap TV, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: JGK's P.
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, color real good, even the sound is good in the 12 X 16 room I have it in. Very happy. It is hooked up to Digital ant. Not cable or dish so all my TVs look better than average.

Reviews.Title: LCD
Reviews.Author: Wmachine
Reviews.Content: Im glad I made this purchase. The screen looks small, but when you watch anything on it the view draws you in. Also this tv isn't like the Coby  model where you cant see the screen from the side. I might get another one for myself. I bought this as a gift .

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: brian h
Reviews.Content: Got this for the kitchen when the tube tv finally died.  Great picture and sound is fine.  Agree with others that it is not great but come on, it's in the kitchen and under $80.  I will get one for the den if it price drops again.

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a great price.
Reviews.Author: JOHN SLINGSBY
Reviews.Content: Great tv at a great price good customer service ,I needed a new tv and this is a good one for my office and it was easy to set up and th epicture is cool....

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Billy Justin Vieregge
Reviews.Content: I am actually very surprised to see how great the picture and the sound quality are coming from such a cheap tv! This this is great! Put it in my kitchen and it works perfectly!

Reviews.Title: For a childs bedroom, it rocks.
Reviews.Author: Aori
Reviews.Content: For the prices it was during the holiday you couldn't go wrong with it. The sound is obviously not great but it is adequate for a bedroom.Mine had some Backlight bleeding in the lower part of the screen, again its a you get what you pay for. It isn't that bad though and my daughter loves being able to watch her shows when she is playing.Has all of the hookups she could possibly need. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Brandon J Finsterwalder
Reviews.Content: Was a fantastic deal and very happy with it. It's a second TV for sports viewing so I don't ever have the sound on, so no comment on that. But was simple to set up and works fine.

Reviews.Title: Like many the audio is meh
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Yea, I'm a Horse."
Reviews.Content: Only complaint is the audio, image wise its great. Would buy another one if it was back at 60ish bucks.

Reviews.Title: Works for me.
Reviews.Author: C. Herring
Reviews.Content: We bought three of these because of size and price to mount in bathrooms. I had read other reviews about the audio quality but knowing where these would be placed, I felt the weak audio would be ok. Olur experience with the audio has been good. We have no trouble hearing and understanding the audio while taking a shower or other bathroom uses. In a large room, I don't know but for us, they look and sound great. The built in tuner does great for over the air tv.

Reviews.Title: Sound so bad you can't use it without extra speakers
Reviews.Author: CS Programmer
Reviews.Content: Additional speakers are required to make this TV usable. My other HD TVs also pick up more channels.off standard cable. Not sure what this does not. Also almost no universal remote has codes for this brand so if you have to run external speakers you will need two remotes. I would pass if was you.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Christina Posch
Reviews.Content: "picture is great straight on can't watch at any other angle, sound too tinny even bass turned all the way"

ProductInfo.Features:
20-inch class HDTV with 1366 x 768 resolution, 16:9 aspect ratio and 60Hz refresh rate
Built in Video Noise Reduction
Support V-CHIP/CCD/Favorite Channel Edition
Menu supports English, French and Spanish
Easily connect your accessory components by utilizing the available multiple connections (including 1 HDMI, 1 VGA, and 1 USB) incorporated in the HDTV
ProductInfo.Name: Seiki SE20HS02 20-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV (Black)
